subject: Horse Racing
lead_paragraph: Divine Park rallied to beat the even-money favorite Commentator by two lengths in the $600,000 Metropolitan Handicap at Belmont Park on Monday. Divine Park, an improving 4-year-old, won for the sixth time in eight races. Commentator, bidding for a third straight victory, set a fast pace in the 115th running of the Met, the traditional Memorial Day feature, but could not hold off Divine Park, who came rolling down the center of the track.
